But that's a lot, it sucks - but I'm trying to wean people off "free". thing is, you get what you pay for, and we have lost our authoritative sources of truth, and upheaval is in the air, and if we don't have those...awful stuff, humans get up to. I'm trying to make this so valuable for both creators and viewers that a youtube subscription at ~$12/mo pales in comparison: creators make way more as they'll make literally ~53% more...at scale we can reduce the cost for viewers, but maybe we can somehow split the difference. also to start, maybe when we onboard, we give creators free upvotes or something...not tokens, not free eth that would be a mess lol, but something to subsidize their interaction. We (may) have to build a dopamine hit in here...somehow. without it resorting to engagement-through-rage manipulation. (I don't love the dopamine idea, but that' show you get people coming  back. I would prefer to disregard.) we're going to need to expose the payment logic publicly to prove we are not skimming/scamming. and...that's what I have to add. it's wildly complex. let me know what you think. Youtube is going to start mass deplatforming people very soon, is my prediction. I am trying to offer creators someplace to go that is actually better. without ads. that may be an evil we must embrace. unsure.
